# UIBarPosition.bottom

**Case**

Specifies that the bar is at the bottom of its containing view.

## Declaration

```swift
case bottom
```

## Discussion

The system uses this as a hint to draw directional decoration accordingly. For example, any shadow would be drawn above the bar.

## Constants

- **UIBarPosition.any**: Specifies that the position is unspecified.
- **UIBarPosition.top**: Specifies that the bar is at the top of its containing view.
- **UIBarPosition.topAttached**: Specifies that the bar is at the top of the screen, as well as its containing view.
